description:
FRANCAIS(english follows)
Petite excursion dans un sentier de pins typique.
Oups! Ai-je bien dit typique? Cette foret est couverte de lichens et est composée de taiga! Ce qui est plutot rare au sud du 78e parallèle.

En dépit de tout ceci, ainsi que des jolis lacs verts, et des curieux geai gris, le sentier peut sembler devenir redondant.

ENGLISHSmall walk in a typical pine forest. 

Oups! Did I say typical? This forest is covered with lichens and taiga! Which is pretty rare south of the 78th parallel.

Despite this and the nice green lakes and the funny little birds you might encounter, the trail might become redundant.

note; the image of the hiker with the mountain top view is also in the 'Parcs des Grands Jardins' but is of lac des Cygnes, and although it is not the image that fits the description of this hike, it shows the nearby options in parc des Grands Jardins.
directions:
FRANCAISDe Baie St-Paul prendre la 138 est puis la 381 jusqu'au Parc des Grands Jardins.ENGLISHFrom Baie St-Paul, take the 138 east then the 381 until you reach the Parc des Grands Jardins.

www.SEPAQ.com
title: La Pinede (Grands Jardins)
